original_text: then the young woman’s father and mother shall bring to the town elders at the gate proof that she was a virgin.
korean_text: 그 처녀의 부모가 그 처녀의 처녀인 표를 얻어가지고 그 성문 장로들에게로 가서

sentences.original_text: then the young woman's father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 젊은 여자의 아버지와 어머니가

sentences.original_text: shall bring to the town elders at the gate
proof that she was a virgin
